title: Create testimonials page with current students, alumni reviews, and review submission form

requirements.text: Create a new Testimonials component that displays a page title 'What Our Students Say' with subtitle 'Read real experiences from our students and alumni, and share your own journey' with bilingual support (English and Bengali)

quotes: Page Title: What Our Students Say
Read real experiences from our students and alumni, and share your own journey.

acceptanceCriteria: Page title 'What Our Students Say' is prominently displayed at the top of the section
Subtitle 'Read real experiences from our students and alumni, and share your own journey' appears below the title
Both title and subtitle support bilingual switching between English and Bengali using LanguageContext
Typography and spacing match existing section headers in the application

requirements.text: Add page introduction section to the Testimonials component displaying 'At Brilliant Coaching Centre, we focus on building confidence, clarity, and academic excellence. Don't just take our word for it—hear from current and past students about how our teachers, notes, and guidance have helped them succeed.' with bilingual support

quotes: At Brilliant Coaching Centre, we focus on building confidence, clarity, and academic excellence. Don't just take our word for it—hear from current and past students about how our teachers, notes, and guidance have helped them succeed.

acceptanceCriteria: Introduction text is displayed in a prominent, readable format below the page title
Text supports bilingual switching between English and Bengali
Styling is consistent with other descriptive text sections in the application

requirements.text: Create Current Students Reviews section with header 'Current Students' displaying three testimonials: Riya Sen (Class 10) - 'Brilliant Coaching Centre has completely changed the way I approach Mathematics. Abhijit Da's problem-solving techniques are easy to follow, and I feel confident in exams now!', Anirban Das (Class 12) - 'Santanu Sir's English classes made grammar and literature so easy to understand. My writing and comprehension skills have improved immensely.', and Priya Roy (Class 3) - 'Sonali Ma'am makes learning fun and interesting. I look forward to my classes every day!' with bilingual support
acceptanceCriteria: Section header 'Current Students' is clearly displayed
All three student testimonials (Riya Sen, Anirban Das, Priya Roy) are rendered with student name, class, and review text
Each testimonial card includes student photo placeholder or avatar
All text content supports bilingual switching between English and Bengali
Cards are displayed in a responsive grid layout or carousel slider

requirements.text: Style Current Students Reviews section with grid layout or carousel slider, student photo/avatar display, hover effects on each card, and mobile-friendly responsive design where cards stack or become swipeable carousel on smaller screens

quotes: Display in grid layout or carousel slider
Include student photo, name, and class
Mobile-friendly: cards stack or swipeable carousel

acceptanceCriteria: Cards display in grid layout (2-3 columns on desktop) or carousel slider
Each card includes student photo placeholder or avatar, name, and class information
Hover effects are applied to cards (e.g., lift, shadow, scale)
On mobile devices, cards stack vertically or become swipeable carousel
Design matches existing component styling with gold/yellow text, dark background, and maroon accents

requirements.text: Create Alumni Feedback section with header 'Alumni Feedback' displaying three testimonials: Arjun Mukherjee - 'The small batch size and personalized attention helped me improve my weak areas. The coaching centre truly focuses on results.', Sneha Chakraborty - 'I still refer to the notes and worksheets provided during my classes. They are extremely useful even for college-level studies.', and Rohan Ghosh - 'The exam-focused tips and practice papers gave me the confidence to perform well in competitive exams. Truly an excellent coaching centre.' with bilingual support
acceptanceCriteria: Section header 'Alumni Feedback' is clearly displayed
All three alumni testimonials (Arjun Mukherjee, Sneha Chakraborty, Rohan Ghosh) are rendered with name and review text
Each testimonial card includes photo placeholder or avatar
All text content supports bilingual switching between English and Bengali
Cards are displayed in carousel or grid layout

requirements.text: Style Alumni Feedback section with carousel or grid layout and optional light background color to visually differentiate it from the Current Students section while maintaining design consistency

quotes: Carousel or grid layout, separate styling from current students
Optional light background color for differentiation

acceptanceCriteria: Alumni cards display in carousel or grid layout
Section uses optional light background color or subtle styling variation to differentiate from Current Students section
Hover effects and responsive behavior match Current Students section
Overall design maintains consistency with application theme

requirements.text: Update the existing SubmitReview component to match the testimonials page specification with header 'Share Your Experience!', subtitle 'We love hearing from our students. Tell us how Brilliant Coaching Centre has helped you grow and learn.', form fields (Full Name required, Class/Year required, Subject(s) Studied optional, Review textarea required, Rating 1-5 stars optional), Submit Review button, and confirmation message 'Thank you for your review! Your feedback helps us improve and inspire other students.' with bilingual support

quotes: We love hearing from our students. Tell us how Brilliant Coaching Centre has helped you grow and learn.

acceptanceCriteria: Component header displays 'Share Your Experience!' with bilingual support
Subtitle 'We love hearing from our students. Tell us how Brilliant Coaching Centre has helped you grow and learn.' is shown below header
Form includes all required fields: Full Name (required), Class/Year (required), Subject(s) Studied (optional), Review (textarea, required), Rating (1-5 stars, optional)
Submit Review button validates required fields before submission
Success message 'Thank you for your review! Your feedback helps us improve and inspire other students.' displays as toast notification on successful submission
All text content supports bilingual switching between English and Bengali

requirements.text: Integrate the new Testimonials component into App.tsx after the TeachersNotes section and before the existing SubmitReview component, maintaining component flow and design consistency
acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials component is imported and rendered in App.tsx
Component is positioned after TeachersNotes section and before SubmitReview component
Component flow and spacing maintain consistency with existing sections
No layout breaks or styling conflicts are introduced

requirements.text: Ensure all text content in the new Testimonials component (page title, introduction, section headers, student testimonials, alumni feedback) supports bilingual switching between English and Bengali using the existing LanguageContext
acceptanceCriteria: All static text in Testimonials component uses the t() translation helper function
Bengali translations are provided for all English text content
Language toggle instantly switches all testimonials section text between English and Bengali
No hardcoded English-only text remains in the component

constraints: Do not modify backend/main.mo unless absolutely necessary - the review submission backend is already implemented

Do not edit immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
Maintain single-actor architecture for backend - all Motoko logic must remain in the main actor file
nonGoals: Do not implement real photo uploads for student testimonials - use placeholder avatars or initials
Do not create admin moderation interface for reviews - backend support exists but frontend admin panel is out of scope
Do not implement social login integration for review submission
Do not add CAPTCHA or bot protection to review forms
Do not create automated testimonial carousel animation (manual navigation only)
Do not integrate third-party review platforms or widgets
